Class Banned_creators

java.lang.Object
MyClasses.Users
MyClasses.Banned_creators

public class Banned_creators extends Users
Singleton that keeps record of banned units

    • trigger

      public boolean trigger(Unit u, int strikes)
      Called when a unit has a reason to be banned
      Parameters:
      u - the unit
      strikes - the amount of chances they have been pardoned previously
      Returns:
      if the unit is banned or pardoned

      Method that prints all units that have ever been banned

    • subscribe

      public void subscribe(Unit u, Users v)
      Proxy between users and units, when a user wants to subscribe, this method checks if the unit is banned If so, the subscription does not happen
      Parameters:
      u - the unit
      v - the user wanting to subscribe
